segments.text: What is this ? I didn't order that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I â€™ m terribly sorry . May I have your order again ? I'll get it right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've ordered savory pork and coleslaw .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I must have made a mistake . I'll bring them for you at once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pardon me , Miss . But didn't you order chicken soup ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , Is that what this is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I believe so . But if it really bothers you , I'll replace it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , don't replace it . Give a refund .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry . I'm afraid we can't . But you may order something else instead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , really ? Give me a clam soup .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you enjoy your dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
